import React from 'react'; import formatMessage from '../locales'; import './Guide.scss'; const Guide: React.FC = () => (
Tab
{formatMessage('GUIDE_NEXT_ROW')}
Shift {' + '} Tab
{formatMessage('GUIDE_PREV_ROW')}
Ctrl / Command {' + '} Z
{formatMessage('GUIDE_UNDO')}
Ctrl / Command {' + '} Y {' / '} Command {' + '} Shift {' + '} Z
{formatMessage('GUIDE_REDO')}
Space
{formatMessage('GUIDE_PLAY')}
); export default Guide;
